titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to prevent the consideration of any tax measure unless it contains a title simplifying the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

bill.summary: Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to prevent the consideration of any tax provision unless the measure containing such provision contains a title simplifying the Internal Revenue Code.
